   16: 
   17: -module(metrics_c2s_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -define(WAIT_TIME, 100).
   24: 
   25: -import(metrics_helper, [assert_counter/2,
   26:                          get_counter_value/1]).
   27: 
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: %% Suite configuration
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [{group, single},
   34:      {group, multiple},
   35:      {group, drop},
   36:      {group, errors},
   37:      {group, count}].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [{single, [sequence], [message_one,
   41:                            stanza_one,
   42:                            presence_one,
   43:                            presence_direct_one,
   44:                            iq_one]},
   45:      {multiple, [sequence], [messages]},
   46:      {drop, [sequence], [bounced
   47:                          ]},
   48:      {errors, [sequence], [error_total,
   49:                            error_mesg,
   50:                            error_iq,
   51:                            error_presence]},
   52:      {count, [sequence], [stanza_count]}].
   53: 
   54: suite() ->
   55:     [{require, ejabberd_node} | escalus:suite()].
   56: 
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% Init & teardown
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: 
   61: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   62:     Config1 = dynamic_modules:stop_running(mod_offline, Config),
   63:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config1).
   64: 
   65: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   66:     dynamic_modules:start_running(Config),
   67:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   68: 
   69: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   70:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   71: 
   72: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   73:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   74: 
   75: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   76:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   77: 
   78: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   79:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   80: 
   81: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   82: %% Message tests
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: 
   85: 
   86: message_one(Config) ->
   87:     {value, MesgSent} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageSent),
   88:     {value, MesgReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageReceived),
   89:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   90: 
   91:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
   92:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
   93: 
   94:         assert_counter(MesgSent + 1, xmppMessageSent),
   95:         assert_counter(MesgReceived + 1, xmppMessageReceived)
   96: 
   97:         end).
   98: 
   99: stanza_one(Config) ->
  100:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  101:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  102:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  103: 
  104:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  105:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  106: 
  107:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  108:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived)
  109: 
  110:         end).
  111: 
  112: presence_one(Config) ->
  113:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  114:         {value, PresenceSent} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceSent),
  115:         {value, PresenceReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceReceived),
  116:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  117:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  118: 
  119:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  120:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  121: 
  122:         assert_counter(PresenceSent + 1, xmppPresenceSent),
  123:         assert_counter(PresenceReceived + 1, xmppPresenceReceived),
  124:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  125:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived)
  126: 
  127:         end).
  128: 
  129: presence_direct_one(Config) ->
  130:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  131:         {value, PresenceSent} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceSent),
  132:         {value, PresenceReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceReceived),
  133:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  134:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  135: 
  136:         Presence = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>),
  137:         escalus:send(Alice, Presence),
  138:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  139: 
  140:         assert_counter(PresenceSent + 1, xmppPresenceSent),
  141:         assert_counter(PresenceReceived + 1, xmppPresenceReceived),
  142:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  143:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived)
  144: 
  145:         end).
  146: 
  147: iq_one(Config) ->
  148:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  149:         {value, IqSent} = get_counter_value(xmppIqSent),
  150:         {value, IqReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppIqReceived),
  151:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  152:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  153: 
  154:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  155:                             escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  156:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  157: 
  158:         assert_counter(IqSent + 1, xmppIqSent),
  159:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  160:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived),
  161:         assert_counter(IqReceived + 1, xmppIqReceived)
  162: 
  163:         end).
  164: 
  165: messages(Config) ->
  166:     {value, MesgSent} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageSent),
  167:     {value, MesgReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageReceived),
  168:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  169: 
  170:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  171:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  172:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  173:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  174:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  175:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  176:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  177:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  178: 
  179:         assert_counter(MesgSent + 4, xmppMessageSent),
  180:         assert_counter(MesgReceived + 4, xmppMessageReceived)
  181: 
  182:         end).
  183: 
  184: bounced(Config) ->
  185:     {value, MesgBounced} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageBounced),
  186:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  187: 
  188:         escalus_client:stop(Bob),
  189:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  190: 
  191:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  192:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  193: 
  194:         assert_counter(MesgBounced + 1, xmppMessageBounced)
  195: 
  196:         end).
  197: 
  198: stanza_count(Config) ->
  199:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  200:         {value, OldStanzaCount} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaCount),
  201: 
  202:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  203:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  204:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  205:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  206:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  207:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  208:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  209:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  210: 
  211:         {value, StanzaCount} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaCount),
  212:         true = StanzaCount >= OldStanzaCount + 4
  213: 
  214:         end).
  215: 
  216: 
  217: %%-----------------------------------------------------
  218: %% Error tests
  219: %%-----------------------------------------------------
  220: 
  221: error_total(Config) ->
  222:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorTotal),
  223:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  224: 
  225:         escalus_client:stop(Bob),
  226:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  227: 
  228:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  229:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  230: 
  231:         assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorTotal)
  232: 
  233:         end).
  234: 
  235: error_mesg(Config) ->
  236:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorMessage),
  237:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  238: 
  239:         escalus_client:stop(Bob),
  240:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  241: 
  242:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  243:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  244: 
  245:         assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorMessage)
  246: 
  247:         end).
  248: 
  249: error_presence(Config) ->
  250:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorPresence),
  251:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  252: 
  253:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  254:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  255: 
  256:         ErrorElt = escalus_stanza:error_element(<<"cancel">>, <<"gone">>),
  257:         Presence = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"error">>, ErrorElt),
  258:         escalus:send(Bob, Presence),
  259:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  260: 
  261:         assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorPresence)
  262: 
  263:         end).
  264: 
  265: error_iq(Config) ->
  266:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorIq),
  267: 
  268:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
  269:     escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  270: 
  271:     timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  272: 
  273:     assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorIq).
